DataElement.preferredName: Patient Greater Than or Equal To CTCAE Grade 2 Diarrhea Assessment Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: a yes/no indicator related to the eligibility of a person who receives medical attention determined to have the same in quantity or of interest exceeds increase of 4 - 6 stools per day over baseline; IV fluids indicated <24hrs; moderate increase in ostomy output compared to baseline; not interfering with ADL.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Greater Than or Equal To CTCAE Grade 2 Diarrhea Assessment
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention determined to have the same in quantity or of interest exceeds increase of 4 - 6 stools per day over baseline; IV fluids indicated <24hrs; moderate increase in ostomy output compared to baseline; not interfering with ADL.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Greater Than or Equal To CTCAE Grade 2 Diarrhea Assessment
Property.preferredDefinition: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that either both objects are the same in quantity or measure or value or status or that the object of interest exceeds the other object in one of these ways.:Increase of 4 - 6 stools per day over baseline; IV fluids indicated <24hrs; moderate increase in ostomy output compared to baseline; not interfering with ADL:Having determined the value, significance, or extent of.

Concepts.definition: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that either both objects are the same in quantity or measure or value or status or that the object of interest exceeds the other object in one of these ways.
Increase of 4-6 stools per day over baseline; moderate increase in ostomy output compared to baseline; limiting instrumental ADL
The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
